mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT B.iboard, B.title, B.iuser, B.regdt, U.unm AS writeNm, U.profileImg FROM t_board B INNER JOIN t_user U ON B.iuser = U.iuser ORDER BY B.iboard DESC
SELECT B.iboard, B.title, B.ctnt , B.iuser, B.regdt, U.unm AS writeNm, U.profileImg FROM t_board B INNER JOIN t_user U ON B.iuser = U.iuser WHERE B.iboard = #{iboard}
